languages.text: {n}Клюв ворона распахивается неестественно широко, язык вываливается наружу, крылья дрожат в агонии. Глаз под языком вперивается в вас, а голос, звучащий из глотки птицы, выворачивает мышцы и суставы.{/n} "Не стоит смеяться над Владыкой Перемен: я таился в оружии танцующих душ гораздо дольше, но все же нашел способ им отомстить. Но я не держу обиды — я жажду увидеть, как ты коснешься Истины Изначальной. Остальное не имеет значения, Дитя Рассвета".

{n}The raven's beak yawns open unnaturally wide, its tongue lolling out and its wings trembling in agony. The eye under its tongue pierces you with its stare, and the sound of the voice that comes from the bird's throat pulls your muscles taut and twists your bones out of their joints.{/n} "Taunting a Lord of Change is unwise. My confinement within the weapon of the dancing souls lasted far longer, yet still, I found a way to exact my revenge. But I am not offended — I yearn to see you touch upon the Primordial Truth. The rest is insignificant, Child of the Dawn."
languages.original_text: {n}Клюв ворона распахивается неестественно широко, язык вываливается наружу, крылья дрожат в агонии. languages.text: {n}Der Schnabel des Raben öffnet sich unnatürlich weit, seine Zunge hängt heraus, und seine Flügel zittern vor Schmerz. Das Auge unter der Zunge durchdringt dich mit seinem Blick, und der Klang der Stimme aus der Kehle des Vogels lässt deine Muskeln verkrampfen und die Knochen aus ihren Gelenken springen.{/n} "Einen Herrscher des Wandels zu verhöhnen, ist unklug. Meine Gefangenschaft in der Waffe der tanzenden Seelen hat weitaus länger gedauert, dennoch habe ich einen Weg gefunden, Rache zu üben. Aber ich bin nicht gekränkt – ich möchte zu gerne sehen, wie Ihr auf die Primordiale Wahrheit trefft. Der Rest ist bedeutungslos, Kind der Dämmerung."
languages.original_text: {n}The raven's beak yawns open unnaturally wide, its tongue lolling out and its wings trembling in agony. The eye under its tongue pierces you with its stare, and the sound of the voice that comes from the bird's throat pulls your muscles taut and twists your bones out of their joints.{/n} "Taunting a Lord of Change is unwise. languages.text: {n}Le bec de la corneille s'ouvre, tellement grand que sa langue pend sur le côté, et ses ailes tremblent de douleur. L'œil sous la langue vous transperce de son regard tandis que la voix émanant du gosier de l'oiseau tend vos muscles et disloque vos articulations.{/n} « Il n'est guère prudent de railler un Duc du Changement. J'ai réussi à me venger des âmes dansantes après être resté emprisonné dans leur arme pendant beaucoup plus longtemps. Cela dit, je ne m'offusque pas de vos provocations, car j'attends avec impatience de vous voir atteindre la Vérité Primordiale. Tout le reste est insignifiant, enfant de l'Aube. »
languages.original_text: {n}The raven's beak yawns open unnaturally wide, its tongue lolling out and its wings trembling in agony. The eye under its tongue pierces you with its stare, and the sound of the voice that comes from the bird's throat pulls your muscles taut and twists your bones out of their joints.{/n} "Taunting a Lord of Change is unwise. My confinement within the weapon of the dancing souls lasted far longer, yet still, I found a way to exact my revenge. But I am not offended — I yearn to see you touch upon the Primordial Truth. The rest is insignificant, Child of the Dawn."

J'ai réussi à me venger des âmes dansantes après être resté emprisonné dans leur arme pendant beaucoup plus longtemps. Cela dit, je ne m'offusque pas de vos provocations, car j'attends avec impatience de vous voir atteindre la Vérité Primordiale. Tout le reste est insignifiant, enfant de l'Aube. »

languages.text: {n}渡鸦以诡异的方式大张着嘴，舌头伸了出来，翅膀痛苦地颤抖着。舌头下面的眼睛凝视着你，目光仿佛要将你刺穿。它的喉咙里挤出了古怪的声响，你不由自主地绷紧了浑身的肌肉，就连骨头都仿佛要从关节里挣脱出来。{/n}“嘲弄诡变魔君恐怕不是什么明智的做法。我曾被困在那些舞蹈的灵魂之中，被囚禁了更长时间，但到最后，我还是找到了复仇的手段。不过，你的话并没有冒犯到我。我渴望看到你触碰原初真理，其他的一切都无关紧要，黎明之子。”

languages.text: {n}El pico del cuervo se abre más de lo que debería ser posible, con la lengua colgando y las alas temblando de agonía. El ojo bajo su lengua te atraviesa con su mirada, y la voz que emerge de la garganta del ave tensa todos tus músculos y disloca tus huesos.{/n} «Mofarse de un Señor de la Transformación es poco sensato. Mi encierro en el arma de las almas danzantes fue mucho más prolongado, y, sin embargo, encontré la forma de cumplir mi venganza. Pero no me ofendes: ansío verte alcanzar la Verdad Primordial. El resto es insignificante, Vástago del Amanecer».
languages.original_text: {n}The raven's beak yawns open unnaturally wide, its tongue lolling out and its wings trembling in agony. The eye under its tongue pierces you with its stare, and the sound of the voice that comes from the bird's throat pulls your muscles taut and twists your bones out of their joints.{/n} "Taunting a Lord of Change is unwise. El resto es insignificante, Vástago del Amanecer».

languages.text: {n}レイヴンのくちばしが異常に大きく開き、舌がだらりと垂れ、翼は苦悶に震えていた。その舌の裏にある眼があなたを鋭く見つめた。鳥の喉から響く声に従って、あなたの筋肉はこわばり、骨は関節からねじれていく。{/n}「ロード・オヴ・チェンジを愚弄するとは賢明とは言い難いな。踊る魂の武器に長く囚われてきたとはいえ、それでも私は復讐を果たす方法を見つけた。だが私は怒ってはいない。お前に『原初の真実』に触れてほしいと思っているからだ。あとは取るに足らないことだ。暁の子よ」
languages.original_text: {n}The raven's beak yawns open unnaturally wide, its tongue lolling out and its wings trembling in agony. The eye under its tongue pierces you with its stare, and the sound of the voice that comes from the bird's throat pulls your muscles taut and twists your bones out of their joints.{/n} "Taunting a Lord of Change is unwise. My confinement within the weapon of the dancing souls lasted far longer, yet still, I found a way to exact my revenge. But I am not offended — I yearn to see you touch upon the Primordial Truth. The rest is insignificant, Child of the Dawn."

languages.text: {n}Kuzgunun gagası doğaüstü bir genişlikle esniyor. Dili sarkıyor, kanatları ıstırapla titriyor. Dil altındaki göz, delici bakışlarını sana saplıyor. Kuşun boğazından yükselen ses, kaslarını gerip kemiklerini eklemlerinden söküyor.{/n} "Değişim Lordu'ya alay etmek akıl kârı değildir. Dans eden ruhların silahında tutsaklığım çok daha uzun sürdü, yine de intikamımı almanın yolunu buldum. Fakat gücenmedim, Ezelî Hakikat'e dokunuşunu görmeyi arzuluyorum. Geri kalan önemsizdir Şafak Evladı."
languages.original_text: {n}The raven's beak yawns open unnaturally wide, its tongue lolling out and its wings trembling in agony. My confinement within the weapon of the dancing souls lasted far longer, yet still, I found a way to exact my revenge. But I am not offended — I yearn to see you touch upon the Primordial Truth. The rest is insignificant, Child of the Dawn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgunun gagası doğaüstü bir genişlikle esner. Dili sarkar, kanatları ıstırapla titrer. Dil altındaki göz, delici bakışlarını sana saplar. Kuşun boğazından yükselen ses, kaslarını gerip kemiklerini eklemlerinden söker.{/n} "Değişim Lordu'ya alay etmek akıl kârı değildir. Dans eden ruhların silahında tutsaklığım çok daha uzun sürdü, yine de intikamımı almanın yolunu buldum. Fakat gücenmedim, Ezelî Hakikat'e dokunuşunu görmeyi arzuluyorum. Geri kalan önemsizdir Şafak Evladı."
